plot: A dog, a child and an old man, abandoned to their luck, see how they change their lives, right on the frontier between Spain and Portugal.
title: Próxima Estación
plot_es: A dog, a child and an old man, abandoned to their luck, see how they change their lives, right on the frontier between Spain and Portugal.
plot_en: A dog, a child and an old man, abandoned to their luck, see how they change their lives, right on the frontier between Spain and Portugal.
